stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of music playing (whether recorded or live)
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of there being music to be heard (playing)
stems.CSV: (to be) a state/act of hearing/listening to music
stems.OBJ: (to be) the sound of music, the particular (piece of) music being heard

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of playing/making music (i.e., on a musical instrument)
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of music being made by the playing of a musical instrument
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of playing music on a musical instrument; to (be) play(ing) a musical instrument
stems.OBJ: (to be) a particular musical instrument (used to play music)

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of composing a passage of music, a musical phrase, a melody, a tune; to compose a melody/tune/musical phrase or passage
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of there being a musical phrase/passage/tune or melody in one’s mind; to be a melody/tune/musical phrase or passage one hears in one’s mind when composing
stems.CSV: (to be) a state/act of composing music; to compose (a passage/piece) of music
stems.OBJ: (to be) the particular melody/tune/musical phrase or passage being composed or played from one’s mind

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of singing being produced and heard (whether recorded or live)
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of there being singing to be heard
stems.CSV: (to be) a state/act of hearing/listening to singing
stems.OBJ: (to be) the sound of singing, the particular (piece of) musical vocalization being heard

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of singing a song; to sing a song [both the physical act thereof and the audible song produced]
stems.CSV: (to be) an act of using one’s voice to sing; to physically use one’s voice to sing

stems.BSC: (to be) a state/act of composing a passage of singing, a musical vocal phrase, a vocal melody/tune and its lyrics; to compose a vocal melody/tune and its lyrics
stems.CTE: (to be) the state of there being a vocal musical phrase/passage/ melody in one’s mind and associated lyrics; to be a melody/tune/musical phrase and lyrics one hears in one’s mind when composing vocal music or song
stems.CSV: (to be) a state/act of composing vocal music or song; to compose (a passage/piece) of vocal music/song
stems.OBJ: (to be) the particular melody/tune/musical phrase/passage and lyrics being composed or played from one’s mind
